statements: SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, treatment FROM medical_records WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE authorized_access = TRUE ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS record_count FROM medical_records GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE treatment IS NULL;
SELECT record_id, patient_id, record_date, diagnosis, treatment, authorized_access FROM medical_records ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE authorized_access = TRUE;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) as total_records FROM medical_records GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT diagnosis, COUNT(*) as diagnosis_count FROM medical_records GROUP BY diagnosis HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY diagnosis_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Flu';
SELECT * FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%pain%';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 12345;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM access_logs WHERE access_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action, access_time FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT access_time, action FROM AccessLogs WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT log_id, action, access_time FROM AccessLogs WHERE action LIKE '%view%';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT log_id, action, access_time FROM AccessLogs WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT CONCAT(patient_name, ' - ', date_of_birth) AS patient_info FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT breach_id, action_taken FROM UnauthorizedAccess ORDER BY alert_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 123;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer';
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT report_id, breach_details, report_date FROM breach_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id > 100;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT patient_name, treatment_plan FROM patient_records WHERE record_id = 3;
SELECT u.username, a.action_type FROM users u JOIN access_logs a ON u.id = a.user_id;
SELECT * FROM medical_records;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital_name FROM doctors JOIN hospitals ON doctors.hospital_id = hospitals.hospital_id;
SELECT user_id, action_performed, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE action_performed = 'LOGIN' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE hospital_id IN (SELECT hospital_id FROM hospitals WHERE location = 'New York');
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM medical_records ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT doctors.doctor_name, hospitals.hospital_name, hospitals.location FROM doctors INNER JOIN hospitals ON doctors.hospital_id = hospitals.hospital_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_access FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT hospital_name, COUNT(doctor_id) AS total_doctors FROM hospitals LEFT JOIN doctors ON hospitals.hospital_id = doctors.hospital_id GROUP BY hospital_name ORDER BY total_doctors DESC;
